txt.en: Culhuc is tending the community oven in Lhan Garan.\n\nTalk to Culhuc.

'Ah, the eggs I asked for. You did wash them in the water before bringing them here, right?'

Before you can answer, he takes hold of one of the eggs and you watch his smile morph into a deep frown.

'No bother. I'll just... wash this egg, and my hands, and just please set them down on the ground and give me a moment.

'Thank you, I suppose.'
Avanc eggs can be found in the Wadewater.\n\nCollect avanc eggs.
Culhuc would like you to forage where the avanc nest in the Wadewater.

'I'd love to get my hands on some avanc eggs, but I'm better at fighting people than I am beasts. It's a hip thing, bending is hard on me. There's a big population of avanc out in the Wadewater.\n\n'Hmm? How many? Well they are big eggs, so six.'
'Head west into the Wadewater to find the avanc and their nests.'
